Leontief inverse matrix

leontief_inverse.Rd

Returns leontief inverse matrix after passing an input requirement matrix as input.

leontief_inverse(A)

Arguments

A

input requirement matrix

Value

leontief_inverse() returns a matrix, when the A matrix is not square or the Leontief matrix can't be inverted it returns an error.

References

Suahasil Nazara & Dong Guo & Geoffrey J.D. Hewings & Chokri Dridi, 2004. "PyIO: Input-Output Analysis with Python," Urban/Regional 0409002, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, USA.

Examples

  set.seed(200100)
  A <- matrix(rnorm(100), nrow = 10)
  leontief_inverse(A)
